title: Romany Remedies and Recipes (Paperback)
author: Gypsy Petulengro
description: A collection of Romany remedies and ointments handed down through the generations. Xavier Petulengro, a British Romanichal horse trader, recorded his family's herbal healing remedies under the pseudonym Gypsy Petulengro. Featuring remedies for sickness, ointments for animals, and advice on fishing and poaching, this volume contains traditional Romany family secrets.
